item.description:
Meeting place TBA. There is a lot to see so, this event will start early probably around 4am (a great time to ride in July). We'll arive at the foot of the white mountains for a hearty breakfast and then start our ride trough the Kancamangus Mountain Pass.

We'll stop frequently to enjoy the spectacular overlooks and breathtaking views, take some photos or maybe even catch a cat nap. At the other end of the pass is Conway where we'll have a late lunch, check out the downtown area and maybe take a quick tour on the Conway Scenic Railway before heading back.

The Kancamagus Scenic Byway follows a beautiful path through New Hampshire's White Mountains. Visitors know it as one of the world's most spectacular fall-foliage trips, but a stunning spectrum of color underscores the region's natural beauty year round. The road meanders through vast forests, old logging roads, and Indian hunting paths. An abundance of history lies here, so we'll take time to pull off the road and explore the rushing Swift River and the beautiful Lower Falls.

http://gorp.away.com/...
http://images.google....
http://www.youtube.co...
http://www.conwayscen...

Maps, meeting place, actual departure time: TBA
item.why: Voted in the "Top 10 Scenic mountain rides" in the U.S.
item.name: Boston Big Iron: White Mountain and Kancamagus Highway tour.
